parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: From meta and noieo; to think differently or afterwards, i.e. Reconsider.
Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From kakos; badness, i.e. depravity, or malignity, or trouble.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Passive - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To want for myself; I want, need; I beg, request, beseech, pray. Middle voice of deo; to beg, i.e. Petition.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.
A form of ara, denoting an interrogation to which a negative answer is presumed.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From apo and hiemi; to send forth, in various applications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Thought, purpose, design, intent. From epi and nous; attention of the mind, i.e. purpose.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Prolonged from a primary kar; the heart, i.e. the thoughts or feelings; also the middle.
